item.description:
Live ~ Local ~ Organic ~ Brunch

It's back! Yes, that's right – we're bringing back brunch at Alchemy on some special select Sundays, and you're invited to experience the most luscious, nutrient-dense, and amazingly delicious brunch around – featuring local products such as eggs, veggies and maple syrup! There will be a wide selection of raw brunch items, as well as your favorite comfort foods!


Enjoy live music and entertainment, and the Alchemy crew proudly serving you the most amazing organic brunch made with LOVE! If you've been missing our brunch, now's your chance! Tell all your family and friends – not to be missed!

Come for brunch anytime from 10-4!
Alchemy Juice Bar Cafe, 203 New Britain Avenue, Hartford. 


Brunch Menu

~ Live Quiche
~ Fresh-squeezed OJ & Grapefruit Juice
~ Local Eggs, sprouted toast & rosemary potatoes
~ Love Alive's Raw Superfood Granola, almond mylk & fresh fruit
~ Vegan Pancakes, coconut "butter," local maple syrup & fruit
~ Live Chia Porridge with fresh fruit & a dollop of macadamia creme
~ Manna Bread French Toast, coconut "butter," syrup & fresh fruit
~ Avocado Sandwich
~ Succulent Sunday Salad
~ Live Parfait
~ Muffins & Cakes, all freshly baked 
~ Live Pie of the day
~ Live Cheezecake of the day
~ Shilajit & Medicinal Teas
~ Sprout Mama's wheatgrass
~ Fermented Veggies
~ Chocolates and more...

 


Restorative Yoga at 9:30 am ~ FREE Class before brunch!
item.name: Live ~ Local ~ Organic ~ Brunch at Alchemy!
